00031 wxMBConv *CharsetConv = &wxConvUTF8;

00033 
00034 #define ART_CLIENT(id) \
00035     choice->Append(_T(#id), (void*)id);
00036 #define ART_ICON(id) \
00037     { \
00038         int ind; \
00039         wxIcon icon = wxArtProvider::GetIcon(id, client, size); \
00040         if ( icon.Ok() ) \
00041             ind = images->Add(icon); \
00042         else \
00043             ind = 0; \
00044         list->InsertItem(index, _T(#id), ind); \
00045         list->SetItemData(index, (long)id); \
00046         index++; \
00047     }

00464 
00465                 att = _T(";");
00466                 if(x+1 < paths.GetCount()){
00467                                 longpath += paths.Item(x) + att;
00468                         }else{
00469                                 longpath += paths.Item(x);
00470                 }               
00471            }
00472            // Write detected path to config file
00473            pConfig->SetPath(_T("/"));
00474            pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/DB-Path"), longpath);        
00475            
00476            delete splash;
00477            wxYield();
00478   }
00479   
00480   if(wordList.GetCount() >0){
00481         gomenu->Enable(xFarDic_First, TRUE);
00482         gomenu->Enable(xFarDic_Last, TRUE);
00483   }
00484 
00485   if ( pConfig->Read(_T("Auto-Select"), 1) != 0 ) {
00486       select = true;
00487       opmenu->Check( xFarDic_Select, TRUE );
00488       if(vtool){
00489         wxToolBarBase *tb = GetToolBar();
00490         tb->ToggleTool( ID_SELECT, TRUE );     
00491       } 
00492     }else{
00493       select = false;
00494     }
00495     
00496     if ( pConfig->Read(_T("Spell"), 1) != 0 ) {
00497       spell = true;      
00498       opmenu->Check( xFarDic_Spell, TRUE );      
00499       if(vtool){
00500         wxToolBarBase *tb = GetToolBar();
00501         tb->ToggleTool( ID_SPELL, TRUE );     
00502       } 
00503     }else{
00504       spell = false;
00505     }   
00506 
00507     if ( pConfig->Read(_T("RevSrch"), 0l) != 0 ) {
00508       revsrch = true;      
00509       opmenu->Check( xFarDic_RevSrch, TRUE );      
00510       if(vtool){
00511         wxToolBarBase *tb = GetToolBar();
00512         tb->ToggleTool( ID_REVSRCH, TRUE );     
00513       } 
00514     }else{
00515       revsrch = false;
00516     }   
00517 
00518    if ( pConfig->Read(_T("Watcher"), 1) != 0 ) {
00519       watcher = true;      
00520       opmenu->Check( xFarDic_Watcher, TRUE );  
00521     }else{
00522       watcher = false;
00523     }   
00524 
00525     if ( pConfig->Read(_T("Scanner"), 1) != 0 ) {
00526       scanner = true;      
00527       opmenu->Check( xFarDic_Scanner, TRUE );
00528     
00529       // Initiating word scanning system
00530       oSelection.Init();
00531       oSelection.start();    
00532     }else{
00533       scanner = false;
00534     }   
00535 
00536     if ( pConfig->Read(_T("Hide"), 0l) != 0 ) {
00537       hide = true;      
00538       opmenu->Check( xFarDic_Hide, TRUE );  
00539     }else{
00540       hide = false;
00541     }   
00542 
00543     if ( pConfig->Read(_T("Srch-Similar"), 0l) != 0 ) {
00544       srch = true;      
00545       opmenu->Check( xFarDic_Srch, TRUE );      
00546       if(vtool){
00547         wxToolBarBase *tb = GetToolBar();
00548         tb->ToggleTool( ID_SRCH, TRUE );     
00549       }         
00550     }else{
00551       srch = false;
00552     }   
00553     
00554     // restore frame position
00555     int x = pConfig->Read(_T("x"), 0l);
00556     int y = pConfig->Read(_T("y"), 0l);
00557 
00558     Move(x,y);
00559 
00560     int save_cache = pConfig->Read(_T("Save-Cache"), 1);
00561 
00562     if( save_cache != 0){
00563       cache = true;
00564     }else{
00565       cache = false;
00566     }    
00567 
00568     entryq = pConfig->Read(_T("Num-Entries"), 10);
00569     
00570     if(cache){
00571       pConfig->SetPath(_T("../Cache"));
00572       wxString str;
00573       long dummy;
00574     
00575       bool bCont = pConfig->GetFirstEntry(str, dummy);
00576       while(bCont){
00577                 m_text->Append(str);
00578                 bCont = pConfig->GetNextEntry(str, dummy);
00579          }
00580      }
00581      m_text->SetSelection(m_text->GetCount()-1);
00582      wxString m_textVal(m_text->GetValue());
00583 
00584      if(select){
00585         m_text->SetSelection(0,m_textVal.Length());
00586      } 
00587      
00588      pConfig->SetPath(_T("/"));
00589 }
00590

00596     delete m_translate;
00597         
00598     Destroy();
00599 }

00617 void xFarDicApp::ViewToolbar(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00618 {
00619     wxToolBar *tbar = GetToolBar();
00620     wxConfigBase *pConfig = wxConfigBase::Get();
00621       if ( pConfig == NULL )
00622       return;
00623       
00624       pConfig->SetPath(_T("/"));
00625 
00626     if ( !vtool )
00627     {
00628         vtool = true;
00629         delete tbar;
00630         RecreateToolbar();      
00631         vimenu->Check( xFarDic_ViewToolBar, TRUE );             
00632         m_resbox->SetSize(4,43,511,160);
00633         m_label->SetSize(12,50,493,145);        
00634         pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/View-Toolbar"), 1); 
00635         translate(m_text->GetValue());
00636     }
00637     else
00638     {
00639         vtool = false;
00640         int y = tbar->GetSize().y;      
00641         delete tbar;
00642         vimenu->Check( xFarDic_ViewToolBar, FALSE );            
00643         SetToolBar(NULL);       
00644         m_resbox->SetSize(4,43,511,160+y);
00645         m_label->SetSize(12,50,493,145+y);
00646         pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/View-Toolbar"), 0);         
00647     }
00648 }

00651 {
00652    DoAutoTrans(); 
00653 }
00654 
00655 void xFarDicApp::DoAutoTrans()
00656 {
00657    if(!revsrch){
00658             wxString m_textVal(m_text->GetValue());
00659             m_textVal.Trim( TRUE );
00660             m_textVal.Trim( FALSE );
00661             m_textVal.MakeLower(); 
00662 
00663             if(CheckSpell(m_textVal, FALSE)){               
00664                     if(m_textVal.Len() >1 && !srch){
00665                             translate(m_textVal);
00666                     }
00667             }
00668     }
00669 }

00673   wxConfigBase *pConfig = wxConfigBase::Get();
00674       if ( pConfig == NULL )
00675       return;
00676       
00677       pConfig->SetPath(_T("/"));
00678 
00679   if ( select == true )
00680   {
00681     select = false;
00682     if(vtool){
00683         wxToolBarBase *tb = GetToolBar();
00684         tb->ToggleTool( ID_SELECT, FALSE );
00685     }   
00686     opmenu->Check( xFarDic_Select, FALSE );
00687     wxString m_textVal;
00688     m_text->SetSelection(0,0);
00689     pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Auto-Select"), 0);
00690 
00691   }else{
00692     select = true;
00693     if(vtool){
00694         wxToolBarBase *tb = GetToolBar();
00695         tb->ToggleTool( ID_SELECT, TRUE );
00696     }   
00697     opmenu->Check( xFarDic_Select, TRUE );    
00698     wxString m_textVal(m_text->GetValue());
00699     m_text->SetSelection(0,m_textVal.Length());
00700     pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Auto-Select"), 1);
00701   }
00702   delete wxConfigBase::Set((wxConfigBase *) NULL);
00703 }

00862 void xFarDicApp::OnCopy(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00863 {

00865 
00866       // write to clipboard

00869           wxTheClipboard->Close();
00870         }
00871 }

00878 }
00879 
00880 void xFarDicApp::OnPaste(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00881 {
00882     DoPaste();
00883 }
00884 
00885 void xFarDicApp::DoPaste()
00886 {
00887     wxTextDataObject data;
00888     wxString Clipstr;
00889 
00891       if(wxTheClipboard->Open()){
00892          if (wxTheClipboard->IsSupported( wxDF_TEXT )){
00893                   wxTheClipboard->GetData(data);
00894                   Clipstr = data.GetText();               
00895 
00896                   if(Clipstr.Len()==0)
00897                   {
00898                       wxString msg;
00899                       msg.Printf( _("Input text is too long.\n"));
00900                       wxMessageBox(msg, _T("xFarDic"), wxOK | wxICON_INFORMATION, this);
00901                       m_text->SetFocus();
00902                       return;
00903                    }else{   
00904                           m_text->SetValue(ProcessWord(Clipstr));        
00905                    }
00906          }
00907           wxTheClipboard->Close();
00908         }    
00909     DoTranslate();
00910 }
00911 
00912 void xFarDicApp::Watcher(wxTimerEvent& event)
00913 {
00914     if(watcher){             
00915             watcher_last = watcher_now.MakeLower();
00916             wxTextDataObject data;
00917 
00918             // read from clipboard
00919             if(wxTheClipboard->Open()){
00920                 wxTheClipboard->GetData(data);
00921                 wxTheClipboard->Close();
00922             }
00923 
00924             watcher_now = data.GetText();
00925 
00926             if(watcher_now.Len() > 40){
00927                 watcher_now = watcher_last;
00928             }
00929 
00930             watcher_now.MakeLower();
00931             watcher_now.Trim(TRUE);
00932             watcher_now.Trim(FALSE);    
00933 
00934             // Purify word!
00935             watcher_now = ProcessWord(watcher_now);
00936     }
00937 
00938     if(scanner){
00939         wxConfigBase *pConfig = wxConfigBase::Get();
00940         scanner_last = scanner_now.MakeLower();
00941         scanner_now = pConfig->Read(_T("/Options/Temp-String"), _T(""));
00942 
00943         scanner_now.MakeLower();
00944         scanner_now.Trim(TRUE);
00945         scanner_now.Trim(FALSE);
00946 
00947         scanner_now = ProcessWord(scanner_now);
00948     }   
00949    
00950     //DEBUGGING
00951     //fprintf(stderr, "Checking Scanner-Now:%s\n", (const char *)scanner_now.mb_str(wxConvUTF8));
00952     //fprintf(stderr, "Checking Scanner-Last:%s\n", (const char *)scanner_last.mb_str(wxConvUTF8));             
00953 
00954     if(watcher){
00955             if(watcher_now.Len() > 0){
00956                 if(!watcher_now.IsSameAs(watcher_last, TRUE) && !watcher_now.IsSameAs(scanner_last, TRUE) && CheckSpell(watcher_now,0) && watcher_now.IsAscii() && watcher_now.IsWord()){           
00957                     m_text->SetValue(watcher_now);
00958                     if(translate(watcher_now)){             
00959                             this->Raise();
00960                             this->SetFocus();
00961                     }
00962                 }
00963             }
00964     }
00965 
00966     if(scanner){
00967             if(scanner_now.Len() > 0 && scanner_now != m_text->GetValue()){
00968                 if(!scanner_now.IsSameAs(scanner_last, TRUE) && !scanner_now.IsSameAs(watcher_last, TRUE) && CheckSpell(scanner_now,0) && scanner_now.IsAscii() && scanner_now.IsWord()){           
00969                     m_text->SetValue(scanner_now);
00970                     translate(scanner_now,false,true);                      
00971                 }
00972             }
00973     }
00974 }
00975 
00976 void xFarDicApp::PopMenu()
00977 {
00978         wxMenu* menuFileT = new wxMenu;
00979         wxArtClient client;
00980 
00981         wxBitmap  bquit = wxArtProvider::GetBitmap(wxART_QUIT, client, wxSize(16,16));
00982         wxBitmap  bpaste = wxArtProvider::GetBitmap(wxART_PASTE, client, wxSize(16,16));
00983         wxBitmap  bsettings = wxArtProvider::GetBitmap(wxT("gtk-preferences"), client, wxSize(16,16));
00984         wxBitmap  bfont = wxArtProvider::GetBitmap(wxART_HELP_SETTINGS, client, wxSize(16,16));
00985         wxBitmap  babout = wxArtProvider::GetBitmap(wxT("gtk-about"), client, wxSize(16,16));
00986     
00987         
00988         wxMenuItem *paste = new wxMenuItem(menuFileT,xFarDic_Paste, _("&Paste and Translate\tCtrl-V"));
00989         paste->SetBitmap(bpaste);
00990         menuFileT->Append(paste);
00991 
00992         wxMenuItem *setfont = new wxMenuItem(menuFileT,xFarDic_Setfont, _("Set Result Box Font\tCtrl+F"));
00993         setfont->SetBitmap(bfont);
00994         menuFileT->Append(setfont);
00995 
00996         wxMenuItem *settings = new wxMenuItem(menuFileT,xFarDic_Settings, _("Open Setti&ngs\tAlt+N"));
00997         settings->SetBitmap(bsettings);
00998         menuFileT->Append(settings);
00999         menuFileT->AppendSeparator();
01000 
01001         wxMenuItem *about = new wxMenuItem(menuFileT,xFarDic_About, _("&About xFarDic\tF1"));
01002         about->SetBitmap(babout);
01003         menuFileT->Append(about);
01004         menuFileT->AppendSeparator();
01005         
01006         wxMenuItem *tquit = new wxMenuItem(menuFileT,xFarDic_QApp, _("&Quit\tCtrl+Q"));
01007         tquit->SetBitmap(bquit);
01008         menuFileT->Append(tquit);
01009         ticon.PopupMenu(menuFileT);
01010 }
01011 
01012 void xFarDicApp::OnSetFont(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
01013 {
01014     ShowSetFont();
01015 }
01016 
01017 void xFarDicApp::ShowSetFont()
01018 {
01019     wxFontData data;
01020     wxConfigBase *pConfig = wxConfigBase::Get();
01021     data.SetInitialFont(m_font);
01022     
01023     wxFontDialog dialog(this, data);
01024     if ( dialog.ShowModal() == wxID_OK )
01025     {
01026         retData = dialog.GetFontData();
01027         m_font = retData.GetChosenFont();        
01028         m_label->SetFont(m_font);       
01029         
01030         pConfig->SetPath(_T("/"));
01031         
01032         pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Font-Face"), m_font.GetFaceName());
01033         pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Font-Size"), m_font.GetPointSize());
01034         pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Font-Style"), m_font.GetStyle());
01035         pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Font-Family"), m_font.GetFamily());
01036         pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Font-Enc"), m_font.GetDefaultEncoding());
01037         pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Font-Wgt"), m_font.GetWeight());
01038         
01039         delete wxConfigBase::Set((wxConfigBase *) NULL);
01040     } 
01041 }
01042 
01044 void xFarDicApp::RecreateToolbar(bool activate)
01045 {
01046     // delete and recreate the toolbar
01047     wxToolBarBase *toolBar = GetToolBar();
01048 
01049     delete toolBar;
01050     SetToolBar(NULL);    
01051 
01052     if(activate){
01053             long style = toolBar ? toolBar->GetWindowStyle() : TOOLBAR_STYLE;   
01054             style &= ~(wxTB_HORIZONTAL | wxTB_VERTICAL);
01055             style |= m_horzToolbar ? wxTB_HORIZONTAL : wxTB_VERTICAL;
01056 
01057             toolBar = CreateToolBar(style, ID_TOOLBAR);     
01058 
01059             // Set up toolbar
01060             wxBitmap toolBarBitmaps[12];
01061             wxArtClient client;
01062 
01063             wxBitmap  cut = wxArtProvider::GetBitmap(wxART_CUT, client, wxDefaultSize);
01064             wxBitmap  quit = wxArtProvider::GetBitmap(wxART_QUIT, client, wxDefaultSize);
01065             wxBitmap  paste = wxArtProvider::GetBitmap(wxART_PASTE, client, wxDefaultSize);
01066             wxBitmap  copy = wxArtProvider::GetBitmap(wxART_COPY, client, wxDefaultSize);
01067             wxBitmap  settings = wxArtProvider::GetBitmap(wxT("gtk-preferences"), client, wxDefaultSize);
01068             wxBitmap  trash = wxArtProvider::GetBitmap(wxART_DELETE, client, wxDefaultSize);
01069             wxBitmap  selectb = wxArtProvider::GetBitmap(wxART_REDO, client, wxDefaultSize);
01070             wxBitmap  btranslate = wxArtProvider::GetBitmap(wxART_FIND, client, wxDefaultSize);
01071             wxBitmap  back = wxArtProvider::GetBitmap(wxART_GO_BACK, client, wxDefaultSize);
01072             wxBitmap  forward = wxArtProvider::GetBitmap(wxART_GO_FORWARD, client, wxDefaultSize);
01073             wxBitmap  spellb = wxArtProvider::GetBitmap(wxT("gtk-spell-check"), client, wxDefaultSize);
01074             wxBitmap  revsrchb = wxArtProvider::GetBitmap(wxART_UNDO, client, wxDefaultSize);
01075             wxBitmap  similar = wxArtProvider::GetBitmap(wxT("gtk-find-and-replace"), client, wxDefaultSize);        
01076 
01077             toolBarBitmaps[0]  = back;
01078             toolBarBitmaps[1]  = forward;
01079             toolBarBitmaps[2]  = similar;
01080             toolBarBitmaps[3]  = quit;
01081             toolBarBitmaps[4]  = selectb;
01082             toolBarBitmaps[5]  = settings;
01083             toolBarBitmaps[6]  = copy;
01084             toolBarBitmaps[7]  = cut;
01085             toolBarBitmaps[8]  = paste;
01086             toolBarBitmaps[9]  = trash;
01087             toolBarBitmaps[10] = spellb;
01088             toolBarBitmaps[11] = revsrchb;
01089 
01090             if ( !m_smallToolbar )
01091             {
01092                 int w = 2*toolBarBitmaps[0].GetWidth(),
01093                     h = 2*toolBarBitmaps[0].GetHeight();
01094                 for ( size_t n = 0; n < WXSIZEOF(toolBarBitmaps); n++ )
01095                 {
01096                     toolBarBitmaps[n] =
01097                         wxBitmap(toolBarBitmaps[n].ConvertToImage().Scale(w, h));
01098                 }
01099 
01100                 toolBar->SetToolBitmapSize(wxSize(w, h));
01101             }
01102 
01103             toolBar->SetToolSeparation(0);
01104 
01105             toolBar->AddTool(ID_BACK, _("Back"), toolBarBitmaps[0], _("Previous Word"));
01106             toolBar->AddTool(ID_FORWARD, _("Fwd"), toolBarBitmaps[1], _("Next Word"));
01107             toolBar->AddSeparator();
01108             toolBar->AddTool(ID_CUT, _("Cut"), toolBarBitmaps[7], _("Cut"));
01109             toolBar->AddTool(ID_COPY, _("Copy"), toolBarBitmaps[6], _("Copy Result"));
01110             toolBar->AddTool(ID_PASTE, _("Paste"), toolBarBitmaps[8], _("Paste and Translate"));
01111             toolBar->AddTool(ID_TRASH, _("Trash"), toolBarBitmaps[9], _("Clear History"));    
01112             toolBar->AddSeparator();
01113             toolBar->AddTool(ID_SELECT, _("Select"), toolBarBitmaps[4], _("Auto Select Text"), wxITEM_CHECK);
01114             toolBar->AddTool(ID_SPELL, _("Spell"), toolBarBitmaps[10], _("Spell Checking"), wxITEM_CHECK);
01115             toolBar->AddTool(ID_REVSRCH, _("RevSrch"), toolBarBitmaps[11], _("Reverse Search"), wxITEM_CHECK);
01116             toolBar->AddTool(ID_SRCH, _("Similar"), toolBarBitmaps[2], _("Return similar words"), wxITEM_CHECK);
01117             toolBar->AddSeparator();
01118             toolBar->AddTool(ID_SETTINGS, _("Settings"), toolBarBitmaps[5], _("Settings"));
01119             toolBar->AddTool(ID_QUIT, _("Quit"), toolBarBitmaps[3], _("Quit"));
01120 
01121             wxToolBarBase *tb = GetToolBar();
01122             tb->EnableTool(ID_BACK, FALSE);
01123             tb->EnableTool(ID_FORWARD, FALSE);
01124 
01125             if(select){
01126                 tb->ToggleTool( ID_SELECT, TRUE );     
01127             }
01128             
01129             if(spell){
01130                 tb->ToggleTool( ID_SPELL, TRUE );     
01131             }
01132 
01133             if(revsrch){
01134                 tb->ToggleTool( ID_REVSRCH, TRUE );     
01135             }
01136 
01137             if(srch){
01138                 tb->ToggleTool( ID_SRCH, TRUE );     
01139             }  
01140     }else{
01141             toolBar = CreateToolBar(-1, ID_TOOLBAR);
01142     }
01143 }

01170 
01171 bool xFarDicApp::translate(wxString m_textVal, bool atrans, bool notify)
01172 {
01173     
01174     if(m_textVal.Len()==0){
01175         m_textVal = m_text->GetValue();    
01176     }
01177 
01178     found = false;
01179     
01180     m_textVal.Trim( TRUE );
01181     m_textVal.Trim( FALSE );
01182     m_textVal.MakeLower();    
01183 
01184     // Purify word!
01185     m_textVal = ProcessWord(m_textVal);
01186 
01187     // DEBUGGING
01188     //fprintf(stderr, "%s\n", (const char *)m_textVal.mb_str(wxConvUTF8));
01189 
01191     if(m_textVal.Len()==0)
01192     {
01193       wxString msg;
01194       msg.Printf( _("Please enter clause.\n"));
01195       wxMessageBox(msg, _T("xFarDic"), wxOK | wxICON_INFORMATION, this);
01196       m_text->SetFocus();
01197       return 0;
01198     }   
01199     
01200     wxString document = path;       
01201 
01202 if(srch && !revsrch){
01203         int y =0;
01204         wxBusyCursor wait;
01205         wxString tmpsrchII;
01206         tmpstr = _T("");
01207         wxProgressDialog prog(_T("xFarDic"),
01208                             _("Please wait..."),
01209                             meanList.GetCount(), 
01210                             this,
01211                             wxPD_APP_MODAL |
01212                             wxPD_AUTO_HIDE |
01213                             wxPD_SMOOTH);
01214         while(y < wordList.GetCount()){         
01215                 tmpsrchII = wordList.Item(y);
01216                 if(tmpsrchII.Contains(m_textVal)){
01217                         found = true;
01218                         tmpstr += meanList.Item(y) + _T(" = ") + tmpsrchII + _T("\n\n");                        
01219                 }
01220                 y++;
01221                 if(y % 500  == 0){
01222                         prog.Update(y);
01223                 }               
01224         }       
01225         wxYield();      
01226         m_label->SetFont(m_font);       
01227         m_label->Clear();
01228         if(tmpstr.Len()!=0){
01229                 m_label->WriteText(tmpstr);
01230         }else{
01231                 m_label->SetValue(_("Phrase not found."));
01232         }
01233 }else{
01234    if(!revsrch){
01235                 if(wordList.Index(m_textVal,false) != wxNOT_FOUND){
01236                         wxString tmpsrchIII;
01237                         int j=0;
01238                         tmpstr = _T("");
01239                         found = true;
01240                         if(m_label->GetValue()){
01241                                 while(j < wordList.GetCount()){         
01242                                         tmpsrchIII = wordList.Item(j);
01243                                         if(tmpsrchIII.IsSameAs(m_textVal)){
01244                                                 tmpstr += meanList.Item(j) + _T("\n\n");                                                                                        
01245                                         }               
01246                                         j++;
01247                                 }
01248                                 m_label->Clear();
01249                                 m_label->SetFont(m_font);       
01250                                 m_label->WriteText(tmpstr);                        
01251                                 m_text->SetValue(wordList.Item(wordList.Index(m_textVal,false)));       
01252                         }
01253                         if(atrans == FALSE){
01254                                 if(m_text->FindString(m_textVal) == -1) {
01255                                    if(m_text->GetCount() <= entryq-1){
01256                                       if(m_textVal.Len()>1){
01257                                         m_text->Append(m_textVal);
01258                                       }
01259                                       m_text->SetSelection(m_text->GetCount()-1);              
01260                                    }else{
01261                                       m_text->Delete(0);
01262                                       if(m_textVal.Len()>1){
01263                                         m_text->Append(m_textVal);
01264                                       }
01265                                       m_text->SetSelection(m_text->GetCount()-1);
01266                                       m_text->SetValue(m_textVal);
01267                                     }
01268                                 }
01269                         }
01270                   }else{
01271                         found = false;
01272                         m_label->SetValue(_("Phrase not found."));                      
01273                   }     
01274    }else{
01275         // implement reverse rearch
01276         int x =0;
01277         wxBusyCursor wait;
01278         wxString tmpsrch;
01279         tmpstr = _T("");
01280         wxProgressDialog prog(_T("xFarDic"),
01281                             _("Please wait..."),
01282                             meanList.GetCount(), 
01283                             this,
01284                             wxPD_APP_MODAL |
01285                             wxPD_AUTO_HIDE |
01286                             wxPD_SMOOTH);
01287         while(x < meanList.GetCount()){         
01288                 tmpsrch = meanList.Item(x);
01289                 if(tmpsrch.Contains(m_textVal)){
01290                         found = true;
01291                         tmpstr += tmpsrch + _T(" = ") + wordList.Item(x) + _T("\n\n");                  
01292                 }
01293                 x++;
01294                 if(x % 500  == 0){
01295                         prog.Update(x);
01296                 }               
01297         }       
01298         wxYield();      
01299         m_label->SetFont(m_font);       
01300         m_label->Clear();
01301         if(tmpstr.Len()!=0){
01302                 m_label->WriteText(tmpstr);
01303         }else{
01304                 m_label->SetValue(_("Phrase not found."));
01305         }
01306    }
01307 }
01308           
01309   if (found && wordList.Index(m_text->GetValue(),false) > 0 && !(1-(wordList.Index(m_text->GetValue(),false)) == 0)){
01310     if(vtool){
01311         wxToolBarBase *tb = GetToolBar();
01312         tb->EnableTool(ID_BACK, TRUE);
01313     }    
01314     gomenu->Enable(xFarDic_Back, TRUE);
01315     if(select){
01316          wxString m_textVal(m_text->GetValue());
01317          m_text->SetSelection(0,m_textVal.Length());
01318     }  
01319   } else {
01320     if(vtool){
01321         wxToolBarBase *tb = GetToolBar();
01322         tb->EnableTool(ID_BACK, FALSE);
01323     }   
01324     gomenu->Enable(xFarDic_Back, FALSE);    
01325   }
01326 
01327   if (found && !((wordList.Index(m_text->GetValue(),false)) == wordList.Index(wordList.Last(),false))){
01328     if(vtool){
01329         wxToolBarBase *tb = GetToolBar();
01330         tb->EnableTool(ID_FORWARD, TRUE);
01331     }  
01332     gomenu->Enable(xFarDic_Forward, TRUE);
01333     if(select){
01334          wxString m_textVal(m_text->GetValue());
01335          m_text->SetSelection(0,m_textVal.Length());
01336     }  
01337   } else {
01338     if(vtool){
01339         wxToolBarBase *tb = GetToolBar();
01340         tb->EnableTool(ID_FORWARD, FALSE);
01341     }   
01342     gomenu->Enable(xFarDic_Forward, FALSE);    
01343   }
01344 
01345   if(select){
01346          wxString m_textVal(m_text->GetValue());
01347          m_text->SetSelection(0,m_textVal.Length());
01348    }  
01349 
01350   if(!found){
01351         m_label->SetValue(_("Phrase not found."));      
01352   }
01353 
01354   if(notify){
01355         ShowNotification(m_textVal, m_label->GetValue());
01356   }
01357   
01358   return found;
01359 }
01360 
01361 void xFarDicApp::OnTranslate(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
01362 {
01363     DoTranslate();     
01364 }
01365 
01366 void xFarDicApp::DoTranslate()
01367 {
01368     wxString m_textVal(m_text->GetValue());
01369     m_textVal.Trim( TRUE );
01370     m_textVal.Trim( FALSE );
01371     m_textVal.MakeLower();    
01372 
01373    if(spell){   
01374      if(!revsrch){      
01375         if(CheckSpell(m_textVal,1) == 0){         
01376              wxString suggestion = ShowAspell(sugList);              
01377              if(suggestion.Len()!=0){
01378                 m_text->SetValue(suggestion);
01379                 m_textVal = suggestion;
01380                 m_textVal.Trim( TRUE );
01381                 m_textVal.Trim( FALSE );
01382                 m_textVal.MakeLower();
01383              }else{
01384                 return;
01385              }               
01386         } 
01387      }
01388     }  
01389 
01390    //let actually translate!
01391    translate();     
01392 }
01393 
01394 wxString xFarDicApp::ShowAspell(wxArrayString sugList)
01395 {
01396     wxSingleChoiceDialog aspelldialog(this,
01397                                 _("xFarDic spell checker found error(s) on your typed word.\n Please choose correct word from list and then click OK."),                               
01398                                 _("xFarDic Spell Checker"),
01399                                 sugList);
01400 
01401         if (aspelldialog.ShowModal() == wxID_OK)
01402         {
01403                 return aspelldialog.GetStringSelection();
01404         }else{
01405                 return wxEmptyString;
01406         }               
01407 }

01414 void xFarDicApp::ShowSettings()
01415 {
01416     if (showSettings) {
01417        // getting main window position
01418        int pos_x, pos_y;
01419        GetPosition(&pos_x, &pos_y);
01420 
01421        // getting mainwindow size
01422        int size_x, size_y;
01423        GetSize(&size_x, &size_y);
01424 
01425        // About window size
01426        int const x = 500;
01427        int const y = 400;
01428 
01429        // About window position
01430        int z = pos_x + (( size_x - x) / 2 );
01431        int w = pos_y + (( size_y - y) / 2 );
01432 
01433 
01434         setframe = new xFarDicSettings(this, _("xFarDic Settings"),
01435                                wxPoint(z, w), wxSize(x, y), m_locale, wxSYSTEM_MENU | wxCAPTION | wxFRAME_FLOAT_ON_PARENT | wxFRAME_NO_TASKBAR);       
01436                
01437        setframe->Show(TRUE);
01438        showSettings = false;
01439      }
01440 }

01460

01470 void xFarDicApp::OnQuit(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
01471 {
01472     DoQuit();
01473 }
01474 
01475 void xFarDicApp::DoQuit()
01476 {
01477     // TRUE is to force the frame to close
01478     wxConfigBase *pConfig = wxConfigBase::Get();
01479     pConfig->SetPath(_T("/"));
01480 
01481     if ( pConfig->Read(_T("/Options/Save-Cache"), 1) != 0 ) {
01482        //delete all entries from file
01483         int count = pConfig->Read(_T("/Options/Num-Entries"), 10);
01484         int textcount = m_text->GetCount();
01485         
01486         pConfig->SetPath(_T("/Cache")); 
01487         wxString str;
01488         long dummy;
01489         int counter =0;
01490         
01491         bool bCont = pConfig->GetFirstEntry(str, dummy);
01492         for(int i=0; i<=textcount; i++)
01493         {
01494                 pConfig->DeleteEntry(str, false);     
01495                 str = _T("");                   
01496                 pConfig->GetFirstEntry(str, dummy);
01497                 counter++;
01498                 //fprintf(stderr, "delete entry:%d\n", counter);
01499         }
01500                         
01501         if(m_text->GetCount() > 0){                                     
01502                 if(textcount < count){
01503                         count = textcount;
01504                 }
01505                 for(int j=0; j<count; j++){                             
01506                         pConfig->Write(m_text->GetString(j), j);                
01507                 }
01508         }       
01509     }else{
01510         //delete all entries from file      
01511         pConfig->SetPath(_T("/"));
01512         pConfig->DeleteGroup(_T("Cache"));      
01513     }    
01514     
01515     pConfig->SetPath(_T("/"));
01516 
01517     if(pConfig->Read(_T("/Options/Win-Pos"), 0l) != 0 ){
01518           int x, y;
01519           GetPosition(&x, &y);
01520           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/x"), (long) x);
01521           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/y"), (long) y);     
01522       }else{
01523           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/Win-Pos"), 0);
01524           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/x"), 0);
01525           pConfig->Write(_T("/Options/y"), 0);    
01526       }
01527     
01528     delete wxConfigBase::Set((wxConfigBase *) NULL);
01529     oSelection.End();
01530     Destroy();
01531 }
01532 
01534 void xFarDicApp::OnClose(wxCloseEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
01535 {
01536     if(hide == true){
01537         this->Show(FALSE);
01538     }else{
01539         DoQuit();
01540     }
01541 }

01594 
01599 bool xFarDicApp::CheckSpell(wxString chkStr, bool suggest)
01600 {
01601         //spell checking goes here
01602         AspellConfig * spell_config = new_aspell_config();
01603 
01604         // Some error handling for Aspell
01605         //if(inputlang.Len()!=0){
01606         //       aspell_config_replace(spell_config, "lang", (const char *)inputlang.mb_str(wxConvUTF8));
01607         //}else{
01608                   aspell_config_replace(spell_config, "lang","en");
01609         //}
01610 
01611         // Small hack for two part words to ignore aspell
01612         if(chkStr.Contains(_T(" "))){ return 1;}
01613 
01614         AspellCanHaveError * possible_err = new_aspell_speller(spell_config);
01615         AspellSpeller * spell_checker = 0;
01616 
01617         if (aspell_error_number(possible_err) != 0){            
01618                 //DEBUGGING
01619                 //fprintf(stderr, "%s",aspell_error_message(possible_err),1);
01620                 if(!aspelli){
01621                         wxString msg;
01622                         msg.Printf(_("It seems that Aspell is not installed.\nxFarDic will not work correctly."));
01623                         wxMessageBox(msg, _T("xFarDic"), wxOK | wxICON_WARNING, this);
01624                         aspelli = true;
01625                 }
01626                 spell =0;
01627                 return 2;
01628         }else{
01629                 spell_checker = to_aspell_speller(possible_err); 
01630         }
01631 
01632         if(suggest){
01633                  const AspellWordList * suggestions = aspell_speller_suggest(spell_checker, (const char *)chkStr.mb_str(wxConvUTF8), chkStr.Len());
01634                  AspellStringEnumeration * elements = aspell_word_list_elements(suggestions);
01635        
01636                   const char * word;
01637 
01638                   // clear array
01639                   sugList.Empty();
01640         
01641                     while ( (word = aspell_string_enumeration_next(elements)) != NULL ){
01642                       // add words to suggestion list        
01643                        size_t copies =1;
01644                         if(wordList.Index(UTF8_STR(word),false) != wxNOT_FOUND){
01645                                sugList.Add(UTF8_STR(word),copies);    
01646                         }
01647                      }
01648         }
01649 
01650         // resturns 1 if correct
01651         return aspell_speller_check(spell_checker, (const char *)chkStr.mb_str(wxConvUTF8), chkStr.Len());
01652 }
01653 
01654 bool xFarDicApp::initDB(const char *filename) {    
01655     int ret, counter;
01656     wxString tmpstr;
01657    
01658     counter =0;          
01659 
01660     reader = xmlReaderForFile(filename, NULL, 0);
01661     if (reader != NULL) {
01662         ret = xmlTextReaderRead(reader);
01663         while (ret == 1){
01664             if(xmlTextReaderNodeType(reader) == 3)           
01665            {
01666                 counter++;            
01667                 if(counter > 2){                                                                
01668                         if(counter % 2 > 0){                    
01669                            size_t copies =1;                       
01670                            tmpstr = UTF8_STR((char *)xmlTextReaderValue(reader));                          
01671                            wordList.Add(tmpstr.Lower(),copies);  
01672                         }else{
01673                            size_t copies =1;
01674                            tmpstr = UTF8_STR((char *)xmlTextReaderValue(reader));                          
01675                            meanList.Add(tmpstr.Lower(),copies);                                                                    
01676                         }
01677                }            
01678           }         
01679             ret = xmlTextReaderRead(reader);                    
01680         }       
01681         
01682         xmlFreeTextReader(reader);               
01683         xmlCleanupParser();
01684         return true;
01685     } else {
01686         wxString msg;
01687         msg.Printf( _("Parse Error. Invalid Document.\n It is possible that XML-DB is not installed.\n Set XML DB path in settings window."));
01688         wxMessageBox(msg, _T("xFarDic"), wxOK | wxICON_STOP, this);
01689         return false;
01690     }
01691 }
01692 
01693 bool xFarDicApp::ShowNotification(wxString word, wxString meaning){
01694 
01695     notify_init("xFarDic");
01696 
01697     //Get Configuration From Config File
01698     wxConfigBase *pConfig = wxConfigBase::Get();
01699 
01700     pConfig->SetPath(_T("/Options"));
01701     int timeout = pConfig->Read(_T("/Options/Scan-Timeout"), 5);
01702     
01703     if(timeout != 0){
01704        timeout = timeout*1000;
01705     }
01706 
01707     if(meaning.Len() > 1500){
01708         meaning.Truncate(1500);
01709         meaning = meaning + _T("...");
01710     }
01711 
01712     if(n == NULL){
01713         n = notify_notification_new ((const char *)word.mb_str(wxConvUTF8), 
01714                                  (const char *)meaning.mb_str(wxConvUTF8),
01715                                   NULL, NULL);
01716     }else{
01717         notify_notification_close (n, NULL);
01718         n = notify_notification_new ((const char *)word.mb_str(wxConvUTF8), 
01719                                  (const char *)meaning.mb_str(wxConvUTF8),
01720                                   NULL, NULL);
01721     }   
01722     
01723     notify_notification_set_timeout (n, timeout); // timeout, 0 will disable that
01724     
01725     if (!notify_notification_show (n, NULL)) 
01726     {
01727         // DEBUGGING
01728         // fprintf(stderr, "failed to send notification\n");
01729         return 1;
01730     }
01731 
01732     delete wxConfigBase::Set((wxConfigBase *) NULL);
01733 }
01734 
01735 wxString xFarDicApp::ProcessWord(wxString word){
01736         wxString LastChar, FirstChar;
01737 
01738         FirstChar = word;
01739         FirstChar.Right(1);
01740 
01741         LastChar = word.Last();
01742 
01743         // DEBUGGING
01744         // fprintf(stderr, "%s\n", (const char *)word.mb_str(wxConvUTF8));
01745                         
01746         // Check last point!    
01747         if(LastChar.IsSameAs(_T("."),FALSE)){
01748                 word = word.RemoveLast();
01749         }
